author: James Tanner
method: For the poached pears, place the wine, vanilla seeds and cherry juice into a pan over a medium heat and bring to a simmer. Add the pear and poach for ten minutes, until softened. For the chocolate sauce, place the chocolate and double cream into a heat-safe bowl, placed over a saucepan of just simmering water. Heat, stirring occasionally until the chocolate has completely melted into the cream. To serve, place the poached pear onto a plate and spoon over the chocolate sauce. Sprinkle with the sesame seeds to finish.
ingredients: 255ml/9fl oz white wine,  1 vanilla pod, seeds scraped out,  50ml/2fl oz cherry juice from a tin of cherries,  1 pear, peeled,  100g/3½oz dark chocolate,  150ml/5½fl oz double cream,  1 tbsp sesame seeds
